Welcome to Montevideo, the vibrant capital city of Uruguay and the host city for Latin-R 2023! Whether you're a conference participant looking to make the most of your time here or a local keen to rediscover your city alongside our international guests, this guide is for you. We've curated a list of essential places to visit and things to do in various categories: from restaurants and entertainment to cultural landmarks and accommodations. Think of this as your go-to resource for useful links and activities that will enrich your Latin-R 2023 experience in Montevideo. Let's dive into the world of opportunities that await you.

You can also find more in: https://www.descubrimontevideo.uy/


## Fin de Semana en el Barrio

- **[La Tira Parrillita de Palermo](https://goo.gl/maps/VBEWR1FpD4pzrB29A)**: A local weekend spot for your barbecue cravings.
- **Su Bar**: For weekday lunch, consider [Su Bar](https://maps.app.goo.gl/fvFrDkHRinQNj4iW9).
- **FunFun**: Enjoy some music and drinks at [FunFun](https://maps.app.goo.gl/2ZPDQPhSpannDFVp9).

### Local Flavors
- **Bar Tasende**: For those who like pizza you should try "pizza al tacho", get the local experience at [Bar Tasende](https://maps.app.goo.gl/j4LVKLUYB1fn6x9RA).
- **Chivito Spots**: Enjoy the best chivito at a rather underground setting. [Fergus](https://maps.app.goo.gl/rjiPCefxeJeAv3kZ8)

### Mercado del Puerto and Surroundings
- **Mercado del Puerto**: A touristy but fun market. 
- **Museo del Carnaval**: Learn about the local Carnival traditions.
- **Local Food Options**: Check [this spot](https://maps.app.goo.gl/8xYxGRUkGd84i4VAA) for local food.
- **El Palenque**: If budget isn't a constraint, check out [this famous place](https://maps.app.goo.gl/WNTR8R5hQKSW6aMk8).

## Restaurants

- **Arcadia**: Check out the fine dining experience at [Arcadia Restaurant](https://www.radissonvictoriaplaza.com.uy/categoria/Restaurante-Arcadia-9).
- **La Casa Violeta**: Visit their [Facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/lacasavioleta/?locale=es_LA) for more details.
- **La Perdiz**: More information can be found at [La Perdiz website](https://laperdiz.com.uy/).

### Special Mentions
- **Plaza de Chueca**: Spanish cuisine at Maldonado 2051, 11200 Montevideo.
- **Mercado de Williman**: Known for Mil Milas.
- **More Options**: Check [this location](https://maps.app.goo.gl/ogr56T14YhrWTxSB6) for another fine dining experience.
